comments.text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux i686) AppleWebKit/535.1 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/13.0.782.215 Safari/535.1

Steps to reproduce:

I'm using dwm as my window manager. For notifications, it highlights the current tag (=virtual desktop) if one of the windows has its X11 URGENT flag set.


Actual results:

Thunderbird does not set that flag when new messages arrive, and there are no possibilities to enable such a feature.


Expected results:

It would be great if there was an option in the notification settings to enable the URGENT flag upon arrival of new messages (or whenever the normal notification sound is played).
